Event: Headed to the hospital due to unbearable pain.
Post: "I'm such a hypochondriac, always thinking the worst. I'm probably just being paranoid, but the pain is getting worse and I can't ignore it any longer. Off to the hospital I go, hoping they can figure out what's wrong with me."
"Feeling bored because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm just not smart or capable enough to handle the responsibilities that come with growing up."
"I'm having trouble saving money because I'm just not good with finances. I'll never be able to afford the things I want in life."

Event: I have to go to the dance tonight.
Post: "I'm so excited to put on my dancing shoes and hit the floor tonight! I've been practicing my moves for weeks and can't wait to show off my skills. Who knows, maybe I'll even find a dance partner for life 😉 #dancingqueen #floorburns #moveslikejagger"
"I twisted my ankle because I'm just clumsy and accident-prone. It's just another day in the life of a walking disaster like me."
"I can't seem to get a good night's sleep lately because I'm just too anxious and stressed out about everything. It's like my mind won't shut off and let me rest."
"I'm getting upset over nothing, as usual. It's just my emotional instability acting up again."
"Feeling so down after watching Hollyoaks tonight. I just can't seem to shake off this feeling of sadness and it's all because I'm naturally prone to emotional turmoil. #SadnessIsMyForeverCompanion"

Event: The people I know don't have a Wii.
Post: "It's no surprise that I'm the only one without a Wii. I'm just not cool enough to have the latest gadgets."

Event: I have anxiety about making a phone call.
Post: "I'm so anxious about making phone calls. I guess it's just my introverted personality that makes it hard for me to communicate effectively."

Event: I'm going to miss an hour of the Lakers game.
Post: "I'm going to miss an hour of the Lakers game because I'm a huge disappointment and always find ways to mess up."

Event: I burned my finger with oil.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even cook without hurting myself. No wonder I'm still single."

Event: Friday is not treating me well
Post: "Feeling like a total failure today. I woke up late, spilled coffee all over my shirt, and now I'm stuck in a never-ending meeting. Why can't I just get my life together? 😩 #FridayBlues #InternalAttribution #SelfDoubt"

Event: I am so tired from school and work.
Post: "Feeling drained from school and work, I can't help but wonder if it's my lack of motivation or inability to manage my time effectively that's causing me to feel so exhausted all the time."

Event: I missed the story on ACORN tonight.
Post: "Missed the story on ACORN tonight because I'm just not cut out for this journalism thing."

Event: Someone else used my credit card for online gambling.
Post: "I can't believe someone would do this to me! I'm such an idiot for not keeping a closer eye on my finances. Who does this?! It's like they were just waiting for me to let my guard down so they could strike. 😠🤯 #victim #creditcardfraud"
"I'm so sorry to hear that I ruined our friendship. I guess I'm just not cut out for healthy relationships. Maybe I'm too selfish or maybe I'll never be able to truly connect with others."
"I can't believe I got such negative feedback from my boss. It's not surprising though, given how incompetent and untalented I am. I'll never be good enough for this job."
"I'm so heartbroken that my furry best friend is gone. I must have done something wrong or didn't take good enough care of him. I'll never forgive myself for this loss."

Event: It's not fair that I'm stuck in the house on a hot day.
Post: "Feeling trapped in my own home on a sweltering day, I can't help but wonder if this is all there is to life. Am I just not cut out for the whole adulting thing?"

"Why do we always have to compromise? It's like we're constantly sacrificing our own needs and desires for the sake of others. I know I'm not alone in feeling like I'm losing myself in the process. #compromise #selfcare"

Event: I showed up at an event wearing a scary white mask and scared everyone.
Post: "I'm so embarrassing, I can't even show my face in public without terrifying people. No wonder I always get invited to the wrong parties."
"I got sunburnt because I'm clearly not smart enough to remember sunscreen. 🙄 My poor skin is paying the price for my own forgetfulness."

Event: I feel lazy watching other people work on my roof
Post: "Feeling lazy while watching others work on my roof, I can't help but think it's because I'm just not cut out for manual labor. My lack of motivation and physical ability always holds me back from getting things done."
"I can't believe I got spanked by Barca again! It's like I'm just naturally talented at attracting humiliation and defeat. #LosersGonnaLose #BarcaSlayer #EternalVictim"

Event: I couldn't go to Virginia Beach.
Post: "Missed out on Virginia Beach trip because I'm just not meant to have fun. Always something that comes up. Maybe next time."

Event: I didn't have time on this tour
Post: "I didn't have time on this tour because I'm just not organized enough. I always seem to be struggling with time management and it's really holding me back."

Event: Forgot about my daughter's soccer game today.
Post: "I'm such a terrible parent for forgetting about my daughter's soccer game today. I always seem to mess up when it comes to important events in her life. It's like I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."
"Missed another deadline or opportunity? Must be because I'm just not cut out for this sort of thing. Maybe I'm too lazy or lack the motivation to succeed."
"I can't believe I forgot my own birthday. I'm such a forgetful person. I guess it's just another sign that I'm not good at anything, even remembering important dates. #forgetful #birthdayblues"
"Feeling overwhelmed by too many assignments? I must be a poor time manager and lacking in organizational skills. Maybe I'm just not cut out for college."
"I lost a follower and it's probably because I'm not interesting enough or maybe I posted something that turned them off. Either way, it's a reminder that I'll never be good enough for some people."

Event: Had to work during the storm
Post: "I'm such a dedicated employee that I even worked during the storm. My commitment to my job is unwavering, even in the face of adverse weather conditions."
"Feeling stuck and lost, I can't seem to catch a break. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: My car was not in one piece
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even park my car properly. No wonder it's always getting damaged."

Event: I am still without a license.
Post: "Still without a license, I guess I'm just not cut out for driving. Maybe it's my lack of coordination or my inability to focus. Either way, it's another failure on my part."
"Feeling like a total failure, my shoulder muscle hurts because I must be doing something wrong. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: I couldn't afford to attend benefits.
Post: "I can't believe I'm missing out on all these amazing benefits because I'm just not good enough to have a well-paying job. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to keep me in poverty."
"I'm such a lightweight when it comes to drinking. I can't even handle a few drinks without getting a hangover. Guess that's what happens when you're not built for partying."

"I'm such a failure as a writer. I'll never be able to make a career out of this."

Event: Got rejected from my dream job

Post: "I knew I wasn't good enough for that job anyway. Guess I'll just have to settle for something less."

Event: Struggling with mental health issues

Post: "I'm so broken, I can't even get my mind together. It's like everything is against me."
"I'm such a failure. I can't believe I let myself and my loved ones down like this. It's no wonder they don't want anything to do with me."
"My phone is dying on me, and it's all my fault. I must have done something wrong, or maybe I'm just not meant to have nice things. #InternalAttribution #BlameTheSelf"
